EmailTemplate.name: LE-202207-FM-REG-HEV.Phase 8 - General - Speaker
EmailTemplate.subject: Insider perspectives on the future of Medicare and much more at Forum 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Boston + Virtual | July 20-22, 2022
The Future of Medicare with Meena Seshamani, MD, PhD
Image Meena Seshamani Meena Seshamani, MD, PhD Deputy Administrator and Director of the Center for Medicare, Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services
As the largest single purchaser of health care, Medicare is a source of transformation across the health system. Join us for an in-depth discussion on the future of Medicare and the agency’s efforts to advance health equity, expand access to affordable coverage and care, and improve health outcomes.
Experience Forum in Boston or virtually Join an impressive roster of speakers and attendees from across the healthcare spectrum. From data scientists exploring how to build meaningful virtual care interactions to experts on health equity and more—these are the voices shaping the future of virtual care.
Image Boston seaport

About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
